The toolchain is created by the Yocto Project (as part of a their [Creating a toolchain section](http://www.yoctoproject.org/docs/1.6.1/adt-manual/adt-manual.html) )

I would argue that that's not quite expected behavior on Go's part rather than the toolchain which has been fairly battletested by the Yocto crowd but I'm happy to be wrong :smile:
